attributes.action: Implementation of a revised assessment during PIP reassessments
attributes.background:
Reconsideration  occurs WHILST YOU ARE IN RECEIPT OF PIP which enables you to do more by  mitigating the challenge that your condition brings.

Using the same assessment as the initial application measures the efficiency of the very benefit you are in receipt of brings you and is self defeating.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. It's clear you want a change to the way PIP applications are reassessed, but we're not sure what you want that change to be. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. 

We'd be very happy to help you write a new petition if you'd like us to. You can email us at petitionscommittee@parliament.uk
